title: Anyone been experiencing bugsplats?
body:
So ever since a few days ago, I've been experiencing bugsplats for the first time since I started this game. Now it's been happening for a while on some of my Snowdown ARURF games and I can't rejoin the game. 

I am wondering if anyone else is experiencing this issue. If not, then it might be a problem with my computer. I'm just looking for a way to fix this. Thanks guys.

PS: For those of you who had me in their ARURF game and I didn't reconnect, I APOLOGIZE! {{sticker:sg-soraka}} It's never happened before and I hope it doesn't happen again.

replies.body: You might have some bad game files that's failing to render, and would result in a bugsplat.  See if a repair or force repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can fix this up.  Test it in a custom game first, though!
Has there been any headway into fixing the issues with Mac users that have upgraded to High Sierra over the last month or so?

I am having the same problem. It never puts me in the game, then when I try to press the reconnect button nothing happens.

UPDATE: Tried to close and open client again, still doesn't work. See if it was a one time thing it isn't tried to play another game same thing happened. I already got Leaver Buster WARNING rip. I am just level 11 HELP ME. Trying to reinstall client now hopefully it works
